Race.SpecificTitle: Councilman at Large -- Seat E, City of Thibodaux
Councilman -- District C, City of Thibodaux
PW Juv. Just. Comm. -- 3.20 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Juvenile Justice Commission)
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 3.20 mills property tax renewal of Juvenile Justice Commission for improving, maintaining or operating Juvenile Justice Facilities in the Parish of Lafourche.
Race.FullText: Shall the Juvenile Justice Commission of the Parish of Lafourche, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a tax of three and twenty hundredths (3.20) mills (the "Tax"), on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $2,090,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2021, for the purpose of improving, maintaining or operating Juvenile Justice Facilities in the Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Prot. Dist. No. 1 -- 10 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 1 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 10 mills tax renewal for Fire Protection District No. 1 of the Parish of Lafourche for acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating the District's fire protection facilities and equipment, including emergency equipment, and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes.
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 1 of the Parish of Lafourche, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a ten (10) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $410,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2021, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating the District's fire protection facilities and equipment, including emergency equipment, and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?
